name: Aino
title: Clinky-Clank Gadgets-A-Gogo
description: A genius mechanic and inventor from Nod-Krai who loves interesting machines and sweet treats.

charged.1: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
charged.2: At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Aino throws a Musecatcher forward, dealing Hydro DMG and dragging her along behind it. When the dragging stops, Aino deals AoE Hydro DMG to nearby opponents.
description.1: Holding the Skill will cause it to behave differently.
description.4: Enter Aiming Mode to adjust the Musecatcher's throwing direction.

description.0: Aino deploys a custom water-spraying device, the Cool Your Jets Ducky to establish a Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone.
description.1: While active, the Cool Your Jets Ducky will periodically fire water balls at nearby opponents, dealing <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro>.

description.0: Aino will be granted the corresponding buff effects based on the party's Moonsign.
description.2: Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Her Elemental Burst Precision Hydronic Cooler is enhanced: The Cool Your Jets Ducky will fire water balls more frequently, and the water balls will deal AoE Hydro DMG over a larger area of effect.

description.0: Aino's Elemental Burst DMG is increased by 50% of her Elemental Mastery.
When Aino is in the party, the party's Moonsign will increase by 1 level.
Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Nod-Krai on the mini-map.
description.1: Additionally, Aino appears to be able to alter the Cool Your Jets Ducky's appearance in some way...

description.0: After Aino uses her Elemental Skill Musecatcher or her Elemental Burst Precision Hydronic Cooler, her Elemental Mastery will be increased by 80. The Elemental Mastery of other nearby active party members will be increased by 80 for 15s.
description.2: The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

constellation2.name: The Principle of Transference in Gear Differentials

description.0: If Aino is off-field while the Focused Hydronic Cooling Zone of her Elemental Burst Precision Hydronic Cooler is active, when your active party member hits a nearby opponent with an attack, the Cool Your Jets Ducky will fire an additional water ball at that opponent, dealing AoE Hydro DMG equal to 25% of Aino's ATK and 100% of her Elemental Mastery. This DMG is considered Elemental Burst DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.

constellation3.name: Cake and the Art of Mechanism Repair

description.0: Increases the Level of Precision Hydronic Cooler by 3.

constellation4.name: Butter and Cats and the Law of Energy Supply

description.0: When the Elemental Skill Musecatcher hits an opponent, it will restore 10 Elemental Energy for Aino. Energy can be restored to her in this manner once every 10s.

constellation5.name: Perpetual Turbine of Metal and Light

description.0: For the next 15s after using the Elemental Burst Precision Hydronic Cooler, DMG from nearby active characters' Electro-Charged, Bloom, Lunar-Charged, and Lunar-Bloom reactions is increased by 15%.
description.1: Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: DMG from the aforementioned reactions will be further increased by 20%.
